description:
Stunning 1 Bedroom, 2 full bathroom duplex in the now refurbished St Vincent De Paul church,   High ceilings, light filled with exposed wood beams.

You will have access to a private balcony and a private deck in the apt. there is washer and dryer in the apt.

I only rent my apt the dates when I am out of town so I am usually only available to assisit you remotely. Should you need in person assistance I will contact my friend or my mother and they will be there to help you with whatever it is that you may need.

Williamsburg is one of the most happening neighborhoods in NYC. Amazing restaurants, bars, shops , murals, frequent pop-up shopping, food trucks, and super markets (wholefoods is 1  block away). Everything you need and more is within 5 mins walk from you. After 17 years in NY I can say that this the best location in the city. 

The apartment is 1 block from the L train station (Bedford stop) which takes you to union square (downtown Manhattan) in 5 mins. There are many taxis around as well and uber's waiting time is usually never more than 3 minutes.
name: Beautiful - sunny loft in the HEART of Wiliamsburg
review: Great experience overall. Beautiful apartment, nicely designed and gets lots of sunlight.
